name: The Fallen Angel (itch)
description:
You play as a Fallen Angel. You have been cast down from heavens but you dont know why. You know Humans have built the Tower of Babel to try to get to heavens, so you set out to conquer it and get back your Angelhood.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera

Spacebar - Jump/Double jump

Shift - Glide

Esc - Pause Menu
